rationale: The segment reports fatal cases. 'Fatal' is a risk-adjective but is not modified by an intensifier or comparative.
statement_text: One version of the virus has caused 863 human infections in 18 countries since 2003, according to the World Health Organization. Of those [863 human infections], 455 were fatal.
